languages.text: "Конвой попал в засаду и был перебит. Последний из солдат оказался предателем и был казнен мной лично".
"The convoy was ambushed and massacred. The only surviving soldier turned out to be a traitor and was personally executed by me."
languages.original_text: "Конвой попал в засаду и был перебит. Последний из солдат оказался предателем и был казнен мной лично".

traits.locale_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred. The only surviving soldier turned out to be a traitor and was personally executed by me."
"The convoy was ambushed and massacred. The only surviving soldier turned out to be a traitor and was personally executed by me."
"The convoy was ambushed and massacred. The only surviving soldier turned out to be a traitor and was personally executed by me."

"The convoy was ambushed and massacred. The only surviving soldier turned out to be a traitor and was personally executed by me."

languages.text: "Der Konvoi wurde aus dem Hinterhalt angegriffen und massakriert. Der einzige überlebende Soldat hat sich als Verräter entpuppt und wurde von mir persönlich hingerichtet."
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred. The only surviving soldier turned out to be a traitor and was personally executed by me."

traits.locale_text: "Der Konvoi wurde aus dem Hinterhalt angegriffen und massakriert. Der einzige überlebende Soldat hat sich als Verräter entpuppt und wurde von mir persönlich hingerichtet."

languages.text: « Le convoi est tombé dans une embuscade et s'est fait massacrer. Le seul soldat rescapé s'est révélé un traître que j'ai exécuté personnellement. »
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred. The only surviving soldier turned out to be a traitor and was personally executed by me."

traits.locale_text: « Le convoi est tombé dans une embuscade et s'est fait massacrer. Le seul soldat rescapé s'est révélé un traître que j'ai exécuté personnellement. »

languages.text: “护卫队遭到了伏击，全员阵亡。唯一幸存的士兵是个叛徒，我亲手处决了他。”
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred. The only surviving soldier turned out to be a traitor and was personally executed by me."

traits.locale_text: “护卫队遭到了伏击，全员阵亡。唯一幸存的士兵是个叛徒，我亲手处决了他。”

languages.text: 「護衛隊は襲撃されて皆殺しにされた。ただひとり生き残った兵士が裏切り者だと分かったので、{mf|俺|私}の手で処刑した」
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred. The only surviving soldier turned out to be a traitor and was personally executed by me."

traits.locale_text: 「護衛隊は襲撃されて皆殺しにされた。ただひとり生き残った兵士が裏切り者だと分かったので、{mf|俺|私}の手で処刑した」

languages.text: «El convoy fue emboscado y masacrado. El único soldado superviviente resultó ser un traidor y lo ejecuté personalmente».
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred. The only surviving soldier turned out to be a traitor and was personally executed by me."

traits.locale_text: «El convoy fue emboscado y masacrado. El único soldado superviviente resultó ser un traidor y lo ejecuté personalmente».

languages.text: "Konvoy pusuya düşmüş ve katledilmiş. Sağ kalan tek asker ise hainin teki çıktı ve bizzat tarafımca infaz edildi."
languages.original_text: "The convoy was ambushed and massacred. The only surviving soldier turned out to be a traitor and was personally executed by me."

traits.locale_text: "Konvoy pusuya düşmüş ve katledilmiş. Sağ kalan tek asker ise hainin teki çıktı ve bizzat tarafımca infaz edildi."
